column1: Jimaguayú (Spanish pronunciation: [ximaɣwaˈʝu]) is a municipality and town in the Camagüey Province of Cuba.

column2: the municipality of Jimaguayú had a population of 21
column3: 169. With a total area of 799 km2 (308 sq mi)
column4: it has a population density of 26.5/km2 (69/sq mi).
